name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo [P_ptI5iH7Vg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

subtitles.original: 寂しさごと包まれたり
subtitles.english: Wrapped up with loneliness

subtitles.original: いつまでも笑い合ったり
subtitles.english: Laughing with each other forever

subtitles.original: たまにはムッと喧嘩をしたり
subtitles.english: Sometimes getting huffy and having a fight

subtitles.original: ずっとずっとそばにいてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to be by my side forever and ever

subtitles.original: 約束だぞっ
subtitles.english: Promise me!

subtitles.original: いっちゃった///
subtitles.english: I said it!

subtitles.original: もしかしたら運命かも
subtitles.english: Maybe it's fate

subtitles.original: 赤い糸が見えちゃうかも
subtitles.english: Maybe I can see the red thread of fate

subtitles.original: 本当はほらバレてるのかも
subtitles.english: Actually, hey, maybe it's been found out

subtitles.original: 目が合わせらんないかも
subtitles.english: Maybe I can't look you in the eye

subtitles.original: 曖昧なんてない
subtitles.english: There's no ambiguity

subtitles.original: たくさん私を見てて
subtitles.english: Look at me a lot

subtitles.original: 指切りった！
subtitles.english: Pinky promised!

subtitles.original: メイデイ、メイデイ
subtitles.english: Mayday, mayday

subtitles.original: メイデイ、声は届いてる？
subtitles.english: Mayday, is my voice reaching you?

subtitles.original: 心がチクッと痛い痛い
subtitles.english: My heart feels a sharp pain

subtitles.original: ベイビー、なんて魅惑的
subtitles.english: Baby, how enchanting

subtitles.original: 見せつけていくの まっすぐにクラクラ
subtitles.english: I'll keep showing it off, straight to a daze

subtitles.original: メイデイ、それじゃ物足りない
subtitles.english: Mayday, that's not enough

subtitles.original: すぐにもっともっと夢中スカイ
subtitles.english: Soon, more and more, into a trance sky

subtitles.original: ヘイ、ヘイ、もっとじらしてよ
subtitles.english: Hey hey, tease me more

subtitles.original: あなたの心に入ってたいの
subtitles.english: I want to enter your heart

subtitles.original: あー、見え透いた甘い罠
subtitles.english: Ah, a transparently sweet trap

subtitles.original: あー、ハマってあげようか
subtitles.english: Ah, shall I fall for it?

subtitles.original: あー、自在にコントロールして
subtitles.english: Ah, control me as you wish

subtitles.original: いたい、はずなのに
subtitles.english: I want to be, even though I shouldn't be...

subtitles.original: クラクラと酔っちゃいそうな舞に誘われ
subtitles.english: Invited to a dance that makes me feel dizzy and drunk

subtitles.original: クラクラと酔ってちゃいそうな夢へ
subtitles.english: To a dream that makes me feel dizzy and drunk

subtitles.original: もうメイデイ、逃がさない
subtitles.english: Now Mayday, I won't let you get away

subtitles.original: 負けだせ クラクラ
subtitles.english: It's a loss, they say, dizzy

subtitles.original: 言っちゃうのはなんでも君のせい
subtitles.english: Everything I say is all your fault

subtitles.original: 絶体絶命にして
subtitles.english: Put me in a desperate situation

subtitles.original: メイデイ、舵が取れないの
subtitles.english: Mayday, I can't take the helm

subtitles.original: 気持ちがもやっと晴れないし
subtitles.english: My feelings are hazy and won't clear

subtitles.original: ベイビー、なんか居られない
subtitles.english: Baby, I can't stay like this

subtitles.original: いまドキドキが one more, one more, one more, one more
subtitles.english: Now my heart is racing, one more, one more, one more, one more

subtitles.original: 絶対あるわけないじゃない
subtitles.english: There's no way it's real, right?

subtitles.original: 絶対にただの勘違い
subtitles.english: It's absolutely just a misunderstanding

subtitles.original: そんな手のひらの上で
subtitles.english: In the palm of your hand like that

subtitles.original: 躍らされているこの感じ
subtitles.english: This feeling of being danced around

subtitles.original: だってもう透け出すような愛を
subtitles.english: Because, a love that's already starting to show through...

subtitles.original: 耳触りなんか変、私じゃないや
subtitles.english: The way it feels on my ears is strange, it's not me

subtitles.original: もうメイデイ、嫌々、でも惚れちゃいそうな私を
subtitles.english: Now Mayday, no, no, but me, who's about to fall in love...

subtitles.original: 困らせてなんか私 狂わせて
subtitles.english: Trouble me, drive me crazy,

subtitles.original: 絶体絶命にして
subtitles.english: put me in a desperate situation

subtitles.original: ねえ、どうして
subtitles.english: Hey, why is it...

subtitles.original: 愛はいたずらするんだろう
subtitles.english: That love plays tricks on us?

subtitles.original: ねえ、いつかは
subtitles.english: Hey, will...

subtitles.original: この痛みも消えるの？
subtitles.english: this pain also disappear someday?

subtitles.original: 本来は案外簡単に
subtitles.english: Originally, it's quite easily

subtitles.original: 否定して壊れちゃうけど
subtitles.english: denied and broken, but...

subtitles.original: 着飾るよ 心を
subtitles.english: I'll dress up my heart

subtitles.original: 気がつけば手を伸ばしちゃって
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I was reaching out my hand

subtitles.original: その尊さ クラクラしちゃう
subtitles.english: That preciousness makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: 君も手を伸ばしてくれ、ほら
subtitles.english: You too, reach out your hand, look

subtitles.original: いたい、ここにいたいほどに
subtitles.english: I want to be here, so much that I want to stay

subtitles.original: 落ち着く場所、その手で触れてよ
subtitles.english: Touch the place where I feel at peace with your hands

subtitles.original: ほらメイデイ
subtitles.english: Look, Mayday

subtitles.original: クラクラと酔っちゃいそうな舞に誘われ
subtitles.english: Invited to a dance that makes me feel dizzy and drunk

subtitles.original: クラクラと酔ってちゃいそうな夢へ
subtitles.english: To a dream that makes me feel dizzy and drunk

subtitles.original: もうメイデイ、help me, rescue me, save me, mayday
subtitles.english: Now Mayday, help me, rescue me, save me, Mayday
